name: formql
description: FormQL - A framework for building dynamic forms
author: Juan Stoppa

scripts.npm_prepare_library_formql: ng build core --prod && cd dist/core && npm publish
scripts.npm_prepare_library_formql_editor: ng build editor --prod && cd dist/editor && npm publish
scripts.npm_prepare_library_formql_material: ng build material --prod && cd dist/material && npm publish
scripts.npm_prepare_all_packages: npm run npm_prepare_library_formql_pack && npm run npm_prepare_library_formql_editor_pack && npm run npm_prepare_library_formql_material_pack
scripts.package_all: npm run npm_prepare_library_formql_pack && npm run npm_prepare_library_formql_editor_pack && npm run npm_prepare_library_formql_material_pack && npm install @formql/core && npm install @formql/editor && npm install @formql/material
scripts.package_and_publish_all: npm run npm_prepare_library_formql && npm run npm_prepare_library_formql_editor && npm run npm_prepare_library_formql_material
